entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is present in the conversation with Rita.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is a journalist for the Daily Prophet and is having a conversation with Hermione.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as someone who is leaning on the Prophet, preventing them from printing certain stories.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the context of a story that shows him in a good light, which the Prophet won't print.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is a newspaper that exists to sell itself and tell people what they want to hear.

relationships.description: Rita mentions that Fudge is leaning on the Prophet, preventing them from printing certain stories.
Rita is a journalist for the Daily Prophet.
Hermione and Rita are having a conversation about the Prophet's willingness to print certain stories.
